segments.text: Wow, I wasn't expecting to see this in the kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window is open, showing a nice garden outside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But inside, everything's a bit chaotic.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The faucet is running full blast, and the sink is full to the brim.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water's spilling over onto the counter and floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is just standing there, polishing her plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She has no idea about the flood happening right at her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And those children, what are they up to?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's on a stool that's tilting backwards dangerously.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's grabbing cookies from the jar with one hand.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is waiting patiently, hand outstretched.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's like a comedy of errors in here.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe they're all so oblivious.
segments.speaker: PAR
